description: This file defines a React functional component named RecipeModal that renders a modal dialog displaying detailed information about a recipe, including image, title, description, ingredients, and instructions. It is used as part of a frontend web application for recipe management or display.

methods.name: RecipeModal({ recipe, onClose })
methods.description: A React functional component that displays recipe details in a modal popup. It includes structure and styling for presentation, handling conditional rendering of ingredients and instructions.
